title: It's been over 2 years now, Riot
body:
{{champion:150}} has had a pitiful win rate ever since the end of 2014. 
http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/gnar

Aside from a narrow peak at 50% at the end of 2015 (likely due to preseason changes just making everything a 50-50) Gnar has had about a 48% win rate for over 2 years now. He's been one of the lowest win rate champions this season, consistently at 44-47%. He's doing just as poorly as the likes of Azir or Ryze (https://na.op.gg/statistics/champion/) except he doesn't bring the 1v9 carry potential in challenger / pro play that required them to be dumpstered. 

Why has this champion been ignored for so long, and relegated to such a weak state? He's DEFINITELY no more "cancer" than Quinn or Jayce or Kennen are as the top lane ranged champions so I'd rather not hear that excuse. He's not oppressive as many are.

I've actually won every game with him this season that I've played. It doesn't change the fact that he's vastly underperforming though (and I've only picked him in to his most favourable matchups this season). 

What bugs me most is that Gnar is a tank-buster with range. The meta this season should be favouring him, and yet he's been at his weakest this entire season. He can farm safely against the range and harass heavy laners that were popular at first, and he can bust the tanks that have been popular since, and yet the whole time he's been weak. 

I don't even think he needs a big buff or anything. He just needs a small numbers buff.
Giving him back the damage he lost on his E would be a good start, I reckon.
Gnar is just pretty team reliant for positioning. Landing ults is difficult if you or your team aren't near a wall.
Youre right about this. He seems very weak right now. So i support a Gnar buff.
I ended up thinking Gnar was like, really, really hard to play without certain things and p much stopped playing him out of fear of being flamed at.
How about we focus on a completely doomed champion like Aatrox before we worry about a champion who at best is kinda "eh" right now?
